item.title: Accelerate: Metrics that Define High-Performance Software Delivery
item.description: Accelerate by Nicole Forsgren, Jez Humble, and Gene Kim was released in 2018, and it changed how I think about software delivery.

item.title: Are you sabotaging your organizational goals?
item.description: I recently came across Simple Sabotage Field Manual. What struck me was you do not need bombs and explosives to start sabotaging.
